text: Lucia was regarding him as a rabbit looks at a stoat. Thrusting his head farther into the coach, he said sombrely: 'Have you ever heard of a punishment called the cord? She blanched and shrank away. Was there not a street near Sant' Angelo called the Lane of the Corda where criminals were hoisted by their wrists forty, fifty, sixty feet into the air, and dropped again and again, until their arms were wrenched from their sockets.' You have heard of it?
